ygData.subject: RE: Rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know about the sharkskin drum. However, the rumor about Ykeshas not going to drop/becoming warrior only is a VERY old rumor. They are still
ygData.messageBody:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mike Roach [mailto:mike.roach@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 6:48 AM

>He also told me his Ykesha was only for trade for 10kpp worth of loot but
>that he was planning on probably holding on to it until after Verant "makes
>the patch that changes the Ykesha to a warrior only weapon" and the price
>"goes through the roof".
>
>Anyone have any knowledge/comments on these rumors?

I don't know about the sharkskin drum.
However, the rumor about Ykeshas not going to drop/becoming warrior only is
a VERY old rumor. They are still dropping, just like normal, on Test
Server. If the rumor had any veracity to it, I would expect to have seen
it already.
